results.title: The Teaching Ambassadors: International Teaching Fellowships
results.creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Ivan Gaal and Victoria. Ministry of Education

video_links.name: The Teaching Ambassadors: International Teaching Fellowships

results.brief_description: Looks at the International Fellowship Scheme which operates in Victoria. Highlights the professional development aspects of the project, the influence visiting participants have on school communities and the input gained by schools upon the return of Victorian recipients. Featured speakers include: Rex Murfett, Susan Gianevsky, Richard Wood, Alex McKnight and Kevin Collins.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jeff Spencer, Ivan Gaal and Victoria. Ministry of Education

results.title: Communication: getting it going
results.creator_credit: George Cass and Victoria. Ministry of Education
results.brief_description: This program shows some of the ways the theme communication can be developed in primary and postprimary English programs. The English framework encourages these ideas as a means of extending and enriching the experiences of all students.

results.title: Trends in children's books
results.creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Ivan Gaal and Victoria. Ministry of Education
results.brief_description: An interview with Albert Ullin, winner of the 1986 Dromkeen Medal award for his contribution to children’s literature. He also talks about changes that have occurred in Australian children’s literature over the past twenty- five years

results.title: Careers in design
results.creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School
results.brief_description: A program which provides an introduction to the design process and how is applied. Aspects mentioned are: function, aesthetics, manufacturing and marketing. Examples of environmental, product and graphics design are illustrated.
